ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:57:20 [Issue ID 4000-4875] urn:comicvine:4000-4875 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:16:57. [Issue ID 15716]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Golden Monster!: SCUBA diver Dane Dorrance hopes to earn his Dad's UDT flippers. Judy Walton hopes to land the lead in the movie "Sea Devils". Biff Bailey hopes to prove he's not a "clumsy ox". Nicky Walton hopes to prove he's a man. Working together, they find a sunken galleon and treasure, fight off a shark, octopus, and Godzilla-monster; and discover they really want to be a team of "underwater trouble shooters" called Sea Devils.
The A-B-Seas of Skin Diving!: Information on scuba diving, equipment, mysteries and joys. And "Never dive alone!"
ComicInfo.Tags: Nicky Walton,Hollywood,Sea Devils,Golden Monster,Judy Walton,Buzzy Brown,Biff Bailey,South Pacific,Dane Dorrance,United States Navy
ComicInfo.Title: The Golden Monster!; The A-B-Seas of Skin Diving!
